metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3575 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The OLE preview generation in Apache OpenOffice before 4.1.1 and OpenOffice.org (OOo) might allow remote attackers to embed arbitrary data into documents via crafted OLE objects.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3575` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libreoffice-mysql-connector - 1:4.2.6.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

libreoffice-wiki-publisher - 1:4.2.6.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required
